PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02412020-04-08,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectInterim Order Respecting Drugs, Medical Devices and Foods for a Special Dietary Purpose in Relation to COVID-19
PrecisINTERIM ORDER RESPECTING THE DRUGS, MEDICAL DEVICES AND FOODS FOR A SPECIAL DIETARY PURPOSE IN RELATION TO COVID-19, made by the Minister of Health on March 30, 2020, in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians through exceptional importation of drugs, medical devices, and foods for special dietary purposes that are in shortage as a direct or indirect result of the COVID-19 pandemic and by providing improved access to biocide drugs.
AttachmentsAttachment
